short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool wrap the content json from flex message simulator or your flex, with data object use on some api of line service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will make it easier to read json text, and wrap the output json from line flex message simulator website or from the user input, will inject some object is required on some LINE API service.
